title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; streaming chat, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now named Open-WebUI); markdown, code highlight, multi-user, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with chat REPL, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension using local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, embed with fluent API and Kotlin extensions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + llama.cpp embeddings + FAISS to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows (chat, generate, embeddings).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async chat, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models to servers with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API exposing Ollama chat completions with Swagger UI and async workers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama featuring markdown, code highlighting, session memory and model switcher.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama HTTP API with Tokio, serde and streaming support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama API for chat, generate and embeddings with GenServer and streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside notes with templating and command palette.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama REST API with synchronous and asynchronous procedures.
